- It is believed to have originated from an animal, most likely a bat 
- Symptoms of the virus include dry cough, fever, and difficulty breathing
- It has spread to many countries worldwide and has claimed more than half a million lives

Nimoy also starred in many other television series and films, as well as directing some feature films and producing two films. He was an avid photographer and also wrote and published several books of poetry.
